summary.span: 提供管理 对象集合的方法。

span.span: Provides methods to manage a collection of objects.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常由其他控件使用，如 、 或 。 is typically used by other controls, such as the , , or . 你可以将位图或图标添加到 ，其他控件可以在需要时使用图像。You can add bitmaps or icons to the , and the other controls are able to use the images as they require. 使用句柄来管理映像的列表。 uses a handle to manage the list of images. 在对 图像列表执行某些操作（例如获取或调用）之前，不会创建 。The is not created until certain operations, such as getting the or calling , are performed on the image list. 执行其他操作（例如设置或） 将导致 重新创建。Performing other operations, such as setting the or will cause the to be recreated. 因此，你应在将图像添加到之前执行这些操作 。Therefore, you should perform these operations before you add images to the . 此外，当你使用将本地化的窗体时，在 窗体的 Language 属性设置为默认值时，始终应添加和图像。In addition, when you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 在添加图像之前更改窗体的语言会损坏应用程序资源文件。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the application resource files. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何选择、删除和显示图像。The following code example shows how to select, remove, and display images. [!code-cpp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ImageList Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ImageList Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 用 、 和 的默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values for , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |项Item|说明Description| |----------|-----------------| ||在 .NET Framework 1.0 版本中，默认值为 。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the default is . 在 .NET Framework 1.1 或更高版本中，默认值为 。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 or later, the default is .| ||默认值是 高度和宽度均为 16 x 16 的对象。The default is a object with a height and width of 16 by 16.| ||默认值是 。The default value is .| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 、向属性添加图像 、设置属性以及 使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其放在包含名为的按钮的窗体中 `Button1` 。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 该示例假定存在且为 `FeatherTexture.bmp` `Gone Fishing.bmp` c：\Windows \\ 。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果系统中不存在位图，或存在于其他位置，请相应地更改示例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将它与一个容器关联起来。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, associating it with a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数使你能够将 与任何 对象关联。The constructor enables you to associate a with any object. 通过将与 类似的关联，你可以将的生存期的控制移交 给 。By associating the like this, you hand over control of the lifetime of the to the . 如果你在应用程序中使用了多个组件，并且想要同时释放它们，这会很有用。This can be useful if you use a number of components in your application, and want to dispose of all of them simultaneously. 例如，如果将 、和与相关联 ，则 对容器调用将强制处理所有这些组件。For example, if you associate a , an , and a with a , calling on the Container will force disposal of all of these components as well.

value.span: 在 .NET Framework 1.1 或更高版本中，默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将颜色深度设置为新值时，将 重新创建图像列表的。When you set the color depth to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 由于设置 属性将导致重新创建句柄，因此应在 设置属性之前设置 。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 如果已创建的句柄 ，则 在代码中设置或属性后，在设置属性后， 将导致为要删除的属性设置的图像集合 。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未创建映像集合，则会在检索此属性时创建。If the image collection has not yet been created, it is created when you retrieve this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 、向属性添加图像 、设置属性以及 使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其放在包含名为的按钮的窗体中 `Button1` 。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 该示例假定存在且为 `FeatherTexture.bmp` `Gone Fishing.bmp` c：\Windows \\ 。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果系统中不存在位图，或存在于其他位置，请相应地更改示例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. summary.span: 获取或设置图像列表中的图像大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the images in the image list.

value.span: 定义列表中的图像高度和宽度（以像素为单位）的 。

span.span: The that defines the height and width, in pixels, of the images in the list.
The default size is 16 by 16.
The maximum size is 256 by 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将 图像添加到映像集合之前将属性设置为会导致图像大小设置为指定的图像大小。Setting the property prior to adding images to the image collection causes the images to be resized to the image size specified. 将 属性设置为新值时，将 重新创建图像列表的。When you set the property to a new value, the for the image list is recreated. 由于设置 属性将导致重新创建句柄，因此应在 设置属性之前设置 。Because setting the property causes the handle to be recreated, you should set prior to setting the property. 如果已创建的句柄 ，则 在代码中设置或属性后，在设置属性后， 将导致为要删除的属性设置的图像集合 。When the handle for the has been created, setting the or properties in code, after setting the property, will cause the collection of images set for the property to be deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 、向属性添加图像 、设置属性以及 使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates constructing an , adding images to the property, setting the property, and using the method. 若要运行此示例，请将其放在包含名为的按钮的窗体中 `Button1` 。To run this example, place it in a form containing a button named `Button1`. 该示例假定存在且为 `FeatherTexture.bmp` `Gone Fishing.bmp` c：\Windows \\ 。The example assumes the existence of `FeatherTexture.bmp` and `Gone Fishing.bmp` at c:\Windows\\. 如果系统中不存在位图，或存在于其他位置，请相应地更改示例。Change the example accordingly if the bitmaps do not exist on your system, or exist at another location. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProviderAndImageListExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是图像列表的数据部分。The is the data portion of the image list. 使用将本地化的窗体时， 在窗体的 Language 属性设置为默认值时，始终应添加和图像。When you work with forms that will be localized, you should always add an and images when the Language property of a form is set to Default. 在添加图像之前更改窗体的语言将损坏图像流。Changing the form's language before you add images will corrupt the image stream. 可以将此句柄传递到的另一个实例 。You can pass this handle to another instance of an .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RecreateHandle As EventHandler

summary.span: 重新创建 时出现。

span.span: Occurs when the is recreated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 通过更改或等操作重新创建时，可以使用此事件进行特殊处理 。You can use this event to do special processing when the is recreated by actions such as changing the or . 可能需要特殊处理 ，因为在设置属性后设置或属性 会导致重新创建句柄并放弃图像。Special processing may be required because setting the or the property after setting the property causes the handle to be recreated and the images to be discarded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ImageList1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ImageList1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#160)]

summary.span: 获取或设置被视为透明的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color to treat as transparent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制图像时不呈现透明颜色。The transparent color is not rendered when the image is drawn.
